Title: California Son
Plot: Hank's father dies. Despite the memories of his father floating to the surface, he doesn't want to go to the funeral. To ease his pain, he goes to bed with a hooker named Trixie, despite the fact he doesn't have enough money to pay her. Meanwhile, Karen does her best to help him overcome the pain.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Mark Margolis, Judy Greer, Kathryn Adams, Nick Barnes, Chris Williams, Amber Heard
